languages.text: {n}Рядом раздается деликатное покашливание. Его источник — чиновник {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}, которого вы видели рядом с Капелланом. Его одежда чиста и безупречно отглажена. На лице, однако, читается крайняя нервозность, почти испуг.{/n} "Дорог{mf|ой|ая} гость{mf||я}, любезн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} Фиделио! Надеюсь, вы удовлетворены услугами нашего заведения?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Рядом раздается деликатное покашливание. Его источник — чиновник Администратума, которого вы видели рядом с Капелланом. Его одежда чиста и безупречно отглажена. На лице, однако, читается крайняя нервозность, почти испуг.{/n} "Дорог{mf|ой|ая} гость{mf||я}, любезн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} Фиделио! Надеюсь, вы удовлетворены услугами нашего заведения?"

languages.text: {n}You hear someone delicately clearing their throat. The source of this sound turns out to be the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk you saw next to Chaplain. His clothes are neat and impeccably pressed. His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "My good {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"
languages.original_text: {n}Рядом раздается деликатное покашливание. Его источник — чиновник {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Администратума{/g}, которого вы видели рядом с Капелланом. Его одежда чиста и безупречно отглажена. На лице, однако, читается крайняя нервозность, почти испуг.{/n} "Дорог{mf|ой|ая} гость{mf||я}, любезн{mf|ый|ая} госпо{mf|дин|жа} Фиделио! Надеюсь, вы удовлетворены услугами нашего заведения?"

traits.locale_text: {n}You hear someone tactfully clearing their throat. The source of this sound turns out to be the Administratum clerk you saw next to Chaplain. His clothes are neat and impeccably ironed. His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "Dear guest, my good {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "Dear guest, my good {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "My good {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

{n}You hear someone delicately clearing their throat. The source of this sound turns out to be the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk you saw next to Chaplain. His clothes are neat and impeccably pressed. His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "My good {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

languages.text: {n}你听到某个人有意地清着嗓子。这个声音的来源，是你之前在牧师身边看到的那个{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的文员。他的衣服笔挺，熨烫得无可挑剔。不过，他脸上却露出了极度紧张的表情，近乎恐惧。{/n}“我亲爱的菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}！您对我们提供的服务还满意吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}You hear someone delicately clearing their throat. The source of this sound turns out to be the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk you saw next to Chaplain. His clothes are neat and impeccably pressed. His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "My good {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}你听到某个人有意地清着嗓子。这个声音的来源，是你之前在牧师身边看到的那个{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}内政部{/g}的文员。他的衣服笔挺，熨烫得无可挑剔。不过，他脸上却露出了极度紧张的表情，近乎恐惧。{/n}“我亲爱的菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}！您对我们提供的服务还满意吧？”

languages.text: {n}Oyes a alguien carraspear delicadamente. El origen del sonido resulta ser el funcionario del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} que estaba junto a Capellán. Su ropa está limpia y planchada impecablemente. Sin embargo, su expresión está a medio camino entre los nervios y el miedo.{/n} «¡Mi buen{mf| señor|a señora} Fidelio! Espero que esté satisfech{mf|o|a} con los servicios de nuestro establecimiento».
languages.original_text: {n}You hear someone delicately clearing their throat. The source of this sound turns out to be the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk you saw next to Chaplain. His clothes are neat and impeccably pressed. His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "My good {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Oyes a alguien carraspear delicadamente. El origen del sonido resulta ser el funcionario del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} que estaba junto a Capellán. Su ropa está limpia y planchada impecablemente. Sin embargo, su expresión está a medio camino entre los nervios y el miedo.{/n} «¡Mi buen{mf| señor|a señora} Fidelio! Espero que esté satisfech{mf|o|a} con los servicios de nuestro establecimiento».

languages.text: {n}誰かが静かに喉を鳴らすのが聞こえる。その音の主は、教戒官の隣に立っていた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}の職員だった。服装は清潔で隅々までアイロンがけされているが、彼の表情は極度に緊張しており、恐怖に満ちている。{/n}「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ！当施設のサービスにご満足いただけたでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: {n}You hear someone delicately clearing their throat. The source of this sound turns out to be the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk you saw next to Chaplain. His clothes are neat and impeccably pressed. His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "My good {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}誰かが静かに喉を鳴らすのが聞こえる。その音の主は、教戒官の隣に立っていた{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}帝国{/g}の職員だった。服装は清潔で隅々までアイロンがけされているが、彼の表情は極度に緊張しており、恐怖に満ちている。{/n}「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオ！当施設のサービスにご満足いただけたでしょうか？」

languages.text: {n}Du hörst, wie sich jemand vorsichtig räuspert. Urheber ist der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}-Angestellte, den du neben Ordenspriester gesehen hast. Seine Kleidung ist sauber und perfekt gebügelt. In seinem Gesicht jedoch erkennst du extreme Nervosität, die an Furcht grenzt.{/n} "{mf|Geschätzter Herr|Geschätzte Herrin} Fidelio! Ich hoffe, Ihr seid zufrieden mit den Diensten unserer Einrichtung?"
languages.original_text: {n}You hear someone delicately clearing their throat. The source of this sound turns out to be the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk you saw next to Chaplain. His clothes are neat and impeccably pressed. His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "My good {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hörst, wie sich jemand vorsichtig räuspert. Urheber ist der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g}-Angestellte, den du neben Ordenspriester gesehen hast. Seine Kleidung ist sauber und perfekt gebügelt. In seinem Gesicht jedoch erkennst du extreme Nervosität, die an Furcht grenzt.{/n} "{mf|Geschätzter Herr|Geschätzte Herrin} Fidelio! Ich hoffe, Ihr seid zufrieden mit den Diensten unserer Einrichtung?"

languages.text: {n}Vous entendez quelqu'un se racler délicatement la gorge. Ce son semble provenir du greffier de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} qui se tenait près de Chapelain. Ses vêtements impeccablement repassés forment un étrange contraste avec la nervosité proche de la terreur qui lui déforme le visage.{/n} « Très {mf|cher maître|chère maîtresse} Fidélio ! J'espère que nos services sont à la hauteur de vos attentes ! »
languages.original_text: {n}You hear someone delicately clearing their throat. The source of this sound turns out to be the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk you saw next to Chaplain. His clothes are neat and impeccably pressed. His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "My good {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous entendez quelqu'un se racler délicatement la gorge. Ce son semble provenir du greffier de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} qui se tenait près de Chapelain. Ses vêtements impeccablement repassés forment un étrange contraste avec la nervosité proche de la terreur qui lui déforme le visage.{/n} « Très {mf|cher maître|chère maîtresse} Fidélio ! J'espère que nos services sont à la hauteur de vos attentes ! »

languages.text: {n}Birinin kibarca boğazını temizlediğini duyuyorsun. Sesin, Papaz'ın yanında gördüğün {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibinden geldiğini anlıyorsun. Kıyafeti düzgün, ütüsü jilet gibi. Âdeta iki dirhem bir çekirdek. Fakat yüzüne korkunun sınırlarında gezinen bir gerginlik hâkim.{/n} "Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım}! Kurumumuzun sağladığı hizmetlerden memnun kalmışsınızdır umarım."
languages.original_text: {n}You hear someone delicately clearing their throat. The source of this sound turns out to be the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} clerk you saw next to Chaplain. His clothes are neat and impeccably pressed. His face, however, reveals extreme nervousness bordering on fear.{/n} "My good {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio! I do hope you're satisfied with the services provided by our establishment?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sakince boğazını temizleyen birini duyuyorsun. Sesin, Papaz'ın yanında gördüğün {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusAdministratum}Administratum{/g} kâtibinden geldiğini anlıyorsun. İki dirhem bir çekirdek gözüküyor. Fakat yüzünde korkuya yakın bir gerginlik var.{/n} "{mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi} Fidelio! İşletmemizin sağladığı hizmetlerden memnun kaldınız mı?"
